subject: Entrepreneurship
title: The Netflix Culture Deck That Changed Everything
description: A 60-second lesson on The Netflix Culture Deck That Changed Everything.

hook.text: Netflix published a 125-slide culture deck. Sheryl Sandberg called it Silicon Valley's most important document.

buildup.text: The deck said: we're a team, not a family. High performance is expected. Adequate performance gets a generous severance.

discovery.text: Netflix gave employees radical freedomâ€”unlimited vacation, no expense approvalsâ€”but demanded radical responsibility.

twist.text: Most companies talk about values. Netflix made them operational: every decision tied back to the culture doc.

climax.text: The deck was viewed over 20 million times and inspired a generation of startups to codify their values.

punchline.text: Culture isn't what you say. It's what you tolerate.

quiz.question: What was revolutionary about Netflix's culture deck?
options: It offered the highest salaries in the industry
It made values operational with radical freedom and responsibility
It eliminated all management layers in the company
